description: AbstractSpace is the abstract superclass for all types of spaces. A space is an entity of volumetric extent in the real world.

properties.name: spaceType
properties.description: Specifies the degree of openness of a space.

properties.name: volume
properties.description: Specifies qualified volumes related to the space.

properties.name: area
properties.description: Specifies qualified areas related to the space.

properties.name: boundary
properties.description: Relates to surfaces that bound the space.

properties.name: lod0Point
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Point geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 0.

properties.name: lod0MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 0.

properties.name: lod0MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 0.

properties.name: lod1Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 1.

properties.name: lod2Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod2MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod2MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod3Solid
properties.description: Relates to a 3D Solid geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 3.

properties.name: lod3MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 3.

properties.name: lod3MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the space in Level of Detail 3.
